name: Needful Fix
description:
Needful Fix is a game about interpretation. You are the owner of the store 'Needful Fix'. Costumers come to you're doorstep with stories and broken items. It is you're task to help only costumers that you know the fate of.

Every turn three costumers need you're help, but be careful only one of them has the chosen fate you're looking for. You win, if you guessed three story endings in a row correctly. But you have to close when you misread the destiny of three customers.

The game was entirely made within 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2020. Every asset from the art, animation, coding, sound and music was made in that time frame.
